All the policy in the world cannot save us from a terrible sifting, and all the efforts made with high authorities will not lift from us the scourging of God, just because sin is cherished. If as a people we do not keep ourselves in the faith and not only advocate with pen and voice the commandments of God, but keep 
                                                                           385
them every one, not violating a single precept knowingly, then weakness and ruin will come upon us. . . .
